column1: Howdy-hey kids!  Would you like a drink?
"Hic" Weh-hell, it's a Christmas party! Hey! You boys! You boys wanna bet me I won't take off my clothes?
That's not the only thing we gotta get workin' again,  if you know what I mean...
Come on, it's time to sit around the tree!
God-damnit it's Christmas and we're gonna be a happy family around the tree!
That's not the only thing that can't get up around here.
Hi there, Mr. Important Political Person. *hic*  You wanna bet me I won't take off my clothes and run naked through this parkin' lot?
I didn't start it! He was looking at my breasts!
What's that? They got your father's penis workin' again?
Aw, hell, we all did it!
